Module contents#

Main module, set up unit registry, new units, unit conversions, unit helper functions.

BASE_PATH = PosixPath('/mnt/c/Users/hrme0001/GitHub/BFMM')#

Package base path.

DATA_PATH = PosixPath('/mnt/c/Users/hrme0001/GitHub/BFMM/data')#

Package data folder path.

SIMULATIONS_PATH = PosixPath('/mnt/c/Users/hrme0001/GitHub/BFMM/data/simulations')#

Simulation output data path.

FIGS_PATH = PosixPath('/mnt/c/Users/hrme0001/GitHub/BFMM/figs')#

Path for figures.

LOGS_PATH = PosixPath('/mnt/c/Users/hrme0001/GitHub/BFMM/logfiles')#

Path for general log files.

Q_#

Pint Quantity with custom units and additional methods.

Custom units are gC, g_gluc, and g_dw. Custom methods are defined below in this module.

zeta_gluc = <Quantity(0.399666944, 'g_carbon / g_gluc')>#

Grams of carbon per grams glucose.

zeta_dw = <Quantity(0.5, 'g_carbon / g_dw')>#

Grams of carbon per grams dry weight.

integrate_with_units(f, a, b)[source]#

Integrate a function using units.

Parameters:

  • f (Callable) – integrand

  • a (Quantity) – lower integral boundary

  • b (Quantity) – upper integral boundary

Return type:

Quantity

Returns:

quad(f, a, b) with units

from_list(l, unit=None)[source]#

Create quantity array from a list of quantities.

Parameters:

  • l (list) – list of quantities with compatible units

  • unit (Optional[str]) – optional, force a unit

Return type:

Quantity

Returns:

Q_(np.array([e for e in l])) with correct units

get_netcdf_unit(q)[source]#

Get the netcdf unit from a Quantity.

Parameters:

q (Quantity) – The quantity to be translated.

Return type:

str

Returns:

The netcdf translation.
